articles.description: Hundreds have been arrested across France after PSG's Champions League win, French officials say.
articles.title: PSG victory parade to go ahead, police say, after more than 190 injured in clashes

articles.description: England face West Indies in the second ODI in Cardiff - follow live scores, radio commentary, video highlights and updates.
articles.title: England vs West Indies LIVE: Second ODI - cricket score, radio, highlights & updates

articles.description: Paris St-Germain's historic Champions League triumph became an emotional and poignant night for Luis Enrique, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: PSG 5-0 Inter Milan: New-look PSG make history on emotional night for Luis Enrique in Champions League final

articles.description: Simon Yates produces a stunning performance on the penultimate stage of the Giro d'Italia to snatch the pink jersey from Isaac del Toro and claim his second Grand Tour title.
articles.title: Giro d'Italia: Simon Yates snatches lead on penultimate stage to claim second Grand Tour title

articles.description: Why is the transfer window opening early and what will Premier League clubs be able to spend this summer?
articles.title: How much will each Premier League club have to spend on transfers this summer?

articles.description: As Alex de Minaur and Casper Ruud speak about burnout, is there too much tennis in the calendar - and what are the solutions?
articles.title: French Open 2025: Players on tennis calendar fears and grappling with injuries throughout season

articles.description: World number one Scottie Scheffler storms to the top of the leaderboard with a four-under-par 68 in a "challenging"  third round of the Memorial Tournament in Columbus, Ohio.
articles.title: Memorial Tournament: Scottie Scheffler storms to top of leaderboard

articles.description: The Indiana Pacers reach the NBA Finals for the first time since 2000 after beating the New York Knicks 125-108 in game six of the Eastern Conference finals.
articles.title: NBA: Indiana Pacers reach NBA Finals after beating New York Knicks in Game 6

articles.description: PSG teenager Desire Doue has gone from a false start to the talk of European football, says BBC Sport's chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: PSG's Desire Doue - the brilliant teen who is the talk of Europe

articles.description: Inter Milan are keen to continue with boss Simone Inzaghi despite their record 5-0 Champions League final defeat by Paris St-Germain.
articles.title: Simone Inzaghi: Inter Milan want boss to stay despite record Champions League final defeat
